title: Errigal
creator_credit: Patrick Carey, Vivien Carey and Aengus Films
brief_description: Errigal is the highest peak of the Decryveagh Mountains in Donegal, Ireland. The mountains and weather impose their own moods on the landscape and the film conveys this feeling of personality in a landscape through the striking use of visuals, music and natural sound
